SUMMARY
University of Southern California
Los Angeles, CA
Master of Science in Spatial Data Science
Jan 2025-Dec 2026(Expected
Software engineer backend with experience in development, cloud deployment, and data-intensive applications. Skilled in Java,
Spring Boot, and modern web technologies with expertise in building scalable systems and responsive user interfaces. Combines
strong backend engineering with practical frontend development to deliver robust and efficient software solutions.
EDUCATION
)
Sichuan Agricultural University
Ya’an, SiChuan
Bachelor of Engineering in Food Quality and Safety
PROJECTS
Sept 2015-June 2019
Food Management & Ordering Web App
July 2024-August 2024
backend Spring Boot authentication, ■Designed merchant-facing order management using with role-based access control,
and real-time order status updates
Redis MySQL ■Implemented caching for frequently accessed queries alongside persistence, reducing average database
load by 40% and improving API response times from 800ms to 480ms
MyBatis-Plus ■Refactored service and repository layers with across 15+ entities to simplify feature additions, reduce
duplicate logic, and improve maintainability
■Collaborated with frontend to define clear API contracts, improving integration speed and reducing change-related bugs
Twitch Game Web App
May 2025-June 2025
backend Twitch API ■Developed services integrating to aggregate and paginate live channels, VODs, and clips with filtering
by game and viewer count
MySQL-backed user storage, ■Implemented secure authentication flows using Spring Security and supporting role-based
access for creators and viewers
JUnit, RESTful ■Wrote 50+ unit and integration tests with reaching 90%+ coverage across services and preventing
regressions during updates
AWS App Runner RDS ECR, CloudWatch IAM ■Deployed backend on with Aurora and configuring monitoring and roles for
secure operations
EasyAI Web App
June 2025-July 2025
backend Java LangChain ■Built an AI-powered document assistant using and for retrieval-augmented generation on PDFs
up to 50MB
chunking ■Engineered a vector indexing pipeline with semantic and embeddings, keeping 90% of query responses under 2
seconds while maintaining context relevance
■Optimized routing and caching strategies that reduced average API latency by 40% during peak usage and stabilized
performance under bursty workloads
REST ■Designed clear endpoints and error-handling contracts to support frontends with features like voice-driven querying and
conversation history
BookingHouse Web App
July 2025-August 2025
backend PostgreSQL Hibernate ■Architected Spring Boot for property listings and bookings using and Spatial to support
radius-based geospatial search across 10,000+ records with sub-200ms response times
JWT-based ■Designed stateless authentication and role-specific authorization using Spring Security to support multi-tenant
hosts and guests
transaction-safe ■Implemented booking conflict checks, availability validation, and updates to prevent double-booking
and data inconsistencies
Google Cloud ■Deployed backend on Platform with autoscaling configurations and integrated logging; coordinated with
AWS Amplify React frontend hosted on
TECHNICAL SKILLS
■Languages: Java, JavaScript, Python, Kotlin, TypeScript, SQL, HTML, CSS, C
■Frameworks & Libraries: Spring Boot, Spring Security, Spring Data JPA, React, Vue.js, Node.js, Express.js, MyBatis
■Databases & Caching: PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redis, Room, Hibernate Spatial
■Cloud & DevOps: AWS (EC2, RDS, Amplify, App Runner, ECR), Google Cloud Platform, Docker, CloudWatch
■Tools & Testing: Git, JUnit, Retrofit, REST APIs, JWT, Hilt, AJAX
